GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.19.6
GSD.description:
net: lantiq_xrx200: restore buffer if memory allocation failed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.6 by commit 3ef2786e32d93e562cd40601248a14ae090de873, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 7ea6cd16f1599c1eac6018751eadbc5fc736b99a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: lantiq_xrx200: restore buffer if memory allocation failed
